frontend/components/IncidentList.tsx.description: The handleResetFilters function at line 65-68 uses window.location.reload() with a TODO comment noting it should be passed from parent. The empty state UI (lines 70-94) shows filter suggestions but lacks a Reset button.

frontend/components/FilterPanel.tsx.description: Contains the proper resetFilters() function at lines 43-51 that sets all filters to defaults: minEvidence: 1, country: 'all', status: 'all', assetType: null, dateRange: 'all'. This pattern should be reused in page.tsx.

frontend/app/page.tsx.description: The resetFilters callback (lines 92-100) sets filters to default values and is memoized with useCallback. This callback can be passed to child components (like IncidentList) via onResetFilters prop to enable instant filter resets without page reload.
